Control Name: PE-4 ACCESS CONTROL FOR TRANSMISSION MEDIUM
Control Statement: The organization controls physical access to [Assignment: organization-defined information system distribution and transmission lines] within organizational facilities using [Assignment: organization-defined security safeguards].
